meanings.sent1: I love to eat cheddars with crackers for a snack.
meanings.sent2: The cheddars at the store come in different flavors.
meanings.sent3: The mouse in the kitchen was caught nibbling on the cheddars.
meanings.sent4: The cheddars melted beautifully on top of the lasagna.
meanings.sent5: The sharp taste of cheddars lingered on my tongue.

meanings.sent1: He saved up all his cheddars to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: She earned a lot of cheddars from her hard work.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had more cheddars in my wallet to buy that cool toy.
meanings.sent4: His cheddars seemed to disappear quickly when shopping.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cheddars jingling in his pocket was satisfying.

meanings.definition: A type of biscuit or cracker
meanings.sent1: I like to snack on cheddars while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: The cheddars in the pantry were all gone after the party.
meanings.sent3: She packed cheddars in her lunchbox for a crunchy treat.
meanings.sent4: The cheddars crumbled in my hand as I took a bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cheddars filled the kitchen.
